thread.title: Manchester United bid £80million for Kylian Mbappe but Monaco refuse to sell teen sensation
thread.title_full: Manchester United bid £80million for Kylian Mbappe but Monaco refuse to sell teen sensation

author: jgordon
title: Manchester United bid £80million for Kylian Mbappe but Monaco refuse to sell teen sensation
text:
going in for the kyl Manchester United bid £80million for Kylian Mbappe but Monaco refuse to sell teen sensation 
Reports in Spain suggest Old Trafford chiefs launched a huge bid - making them the first team to make a formal offer Gossip 22nd March 2017, 11:20 pm Updated: 22nd March 2017, 11:42 pm Comments MANCHESTER UNITED launched a stunning £80million bid for teen sensation Kylian Mbappe but Monaco refused to sell. 3 Kylian Mbappe has put in a series of impressive displays 
And according to Spanish radio station Cadena COPE , United were the first to test the waters with a huge offer. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Monaco are desperate to keep hold of the striker who is also the subject of strong interest from Real Madrid. 
The wealthy outfit are set to land up to £58m from United for Anthony Martial depending on clauses being met. MOST READ IN SPORT Paige sex tape bombshell as fans express outrage at 'sex act over WWE championship belt' ROYAL FUMBLE British WWE star Paige confirms X-rated leak after videos were hacked from her phone and posted online mark of respect FA plan tribute to security services and victims against Lithuania on Sunday after terror attack FORGETTING SOMETHING? Tennis legend Roger Federer hits bum note as he signs autograph for fan... who looks like she's forgotten her underwear BAK TO THE FUTURE Chelsea 'have agreed a contract' with Monaco rising star Tiemoue Bakayoko, says Guillem Balague Team news Jake Livemore and Michael Keane start for England in Germany as Gareth Southgate experiments with 3-4-3 X-rated pic LEAK Former WWE superstar Kaitlyn is latest wrestler to have apparent nude photos leaked... just days after fellow Diva Paige's sex-tape scandal 
And Mbappe is regarded as an even better prospect that the Frenchman who came good under Louis van Gaal before struggling to impress Jose Mourinho. 
The pacey striker – who has been compared to Thierry Henry – has netted 17 times for this season. Getty Images Mbappe is pictured arriving at Clarefontaine to link up with the France squad Getty Images Kylian Mbappe powers home against Manchester City Monaco forward Kylian Mbappe sings in front of new France team-mates 
Some sources claim Monaco would demand a £129m fee – which would steamroller the world record set by Paul Pogba when he moved from Juventus to United for £89m last summer .
